Creates a new ExternalSearchRequestData.

Parameters:
params Search settings.
service Service to use.
values Search input values as per ExternalSearchDesc.
startHitIdx Start index of hits to send back.
nbrHits (Max) number of hits to return.
coord The input coordinates.
itemInfoFilter Filter for item info
